Vancouver's best coffee/shops

Comments:


No comments

1 points

  •  
  •

2.67 from 3 votes

Created: Nov. 25th, 2009

factors include: coffee quality, atmosphere, servi

Tags:

 

  • Beanery (UBC)

    Acadia residences, great for chillin, friendly, good food, decent coffee, has wifi

  • Edge Cafe

    Yukon and B'way, awesome coffee, best soylatte, decent baristas, great food (but $$), good for chillin, patio, has wifi

  • Bean Around the World

    many locations, great coffee, good baristas, good food, no wif

  • 49th Parallel

    W 4th near Arbutus, awesome coffee, everything brewed on demand, great baristas, great food, good atmosphere, wifi?

  • Arbutus Coffee Shop

    great coffee, very chilled place, good food, has wifi

  • JJ Bean

    Main @ 14th is best, good coffee, very good baristas, decent food, bright and fairly chilled, no wifi

  • Amici

    commercial drive, great coffee, good baristas, wifi, chilled

  • Cafe Artigiano

    Hornby location is best, awesome coffee, great consistent baristas, decent for chillin, no wifi
